biography: Olli, a devoted admirer of Bryson Dechambeau, is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Hirsala Golf with unwavering passion. He is set to make his ninth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.

With eight past appearances, Olli has proven to be a formidable competitor. His dedication and skill have led him to secure the coveted Hector Trophée once, as well as the Victor Trophy, awarded to the best individual player.

Known for his meticulous approach and strategic gameplay, Olli brings a unique blend of intensity and sportsmanship to the competition. His deep understanding of the game, combined with his unwavering support for Bryson, makes him a compelling figure to watch at every tournament.
